VEvil.​GameLogic.​Teams.​TeamIndicator
MonoBehaviour
public
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Teams.​TeamIndicator

TeamIndicator helps define the team of an entity.

Variables
onTeamChanged
private Action<ETeamType> onTeamChanged

Invoked when this TeamIndicator has changed its ETeamType value.

Parameter
Arg 01

The new ETeamType of this TeamIndicator.

Properties
Team
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("The team of this entity.\nLeave it to 'UNKNOWN' if you wish to directly modify it at this entity's initialization.")]
public ETeamType Team {
get;
set
}

The ETeamType of this entity.

Leave it to ETeamType.UNKNOWN you wish to directly modify it at this entity's initialization.  Use ChangeTeam if you wish to modify this value at runtime.

OnTeamChanged
public event Action<ETeamType> OnTeamChanged {
add;
remove
}

Change this TeamIndicator's ETeamType.
